alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST CENTRAL LAKE COUNTY THROUGH 215 PM CDT... At 144 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Babbitt, or 25 miles south of Ely, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Lake County, including the following locations... Seven Beaver Lake and Greenwood Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
